one.contentbox.boxd

类 BoxdDaemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • one.contentbox.boxd.BoxdDaemon
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BoxdDaemon
extends java.lang.Thread
    Boxd Daemon class will listen the new block info from rpc node
